name: Rebreeze
description:
IF YOU ARE EXPERIENCING ISSUES, PLEASE READ THE FAQ AND THE MESSAGE

The HTML version has bugs related to Unity's WebGL compiler. If you are able, please download the standalone version!

DOWNLOAD THE STANDALONE VERSION HERE!

Common Problems and FAQ:

Problem: When I reverse, there is no music.

Fix: This is an issue in Unity's WebGL player, as it seems it doesn't support reversing audio. Please download the standalone version.

Problem: The restart key doesn't work.

Fix: Be sure you are holding the restart key for long enough. If you are sure it should restart, try refresing your browser and clearing it's cache. If that still doesn't work, please try running the standalone version.

Problem: The reverse key doesn't work.

Fix: Be sure that if you are next to a timestone if you don't have a tape recorder. If you are near one, and it still doesn't work, please try the solutions in the previous fix.

Rebreeze is a short game about escaping a dungeon in a mysterious world by manipulating time and space and solving puzzles.

Features include:

  • An all-original soundtrack
  • Retro 2-bit (a.k.a. gameboy) graphics 
  • Interesting and unique puzzles

A, D - Move
W, S - Look up/down
Space - Jump
CTRL or Z - Reverse world time
SHIFT or X - Reverse player (only when tape recorder aquired)
Hold R - Restart
